column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Unpopular opinion: reporting here from 2021's state with best pizza - NJ! Ya'll I was skeptical about trying deep-dish pizza
column2: but I had to do it being in Chicago for the first time. My expectations were real low; however
column3: I have to admit I was ever-so-pleasantly surprised. I was proven wrong by this delicious custom deep dish with butter crust. Heaven in each bite. Dare I say
column4: better than many pies I've had in NJ. Not the best looking pizza
column5: but boy does it hit the spot. My husband and I shared the bruschetta (amazing!) and a small pie with veggies and light cheese (still cheesy!) and it was filling! Keep in mind that the deep dish pies take approximately 45 minutes to cook
